languages.text: "Из этой философии, дознаватель ван Калокс, проистекают поступки. Мои. Твои. Лорд-инквизитора. Почему ты избегаешь говорить о том, что Ксавьер Калькасар — опасный радикал? Настолько же, насколько им стала я — только не во имя утопических идей, а во имя защиты Человечества с помощью расширенного инструментария".

"Actions are being driven by this philosophy, Interrogator van Calox. Mine. Yours. The Lord Inquisitor's. Why are you avoiding talking about the fact that Xavier Calcazar is a dangerous radical? No less dangerous than I am — except I am not driven by utopian ideals, but by a desire to protect Humanity... using a broader range of tools."
languages.original_text: "Из этой философии, дознаватель ван Калокс, проистекают поступки. Мои. Твои. Лорд-инквизитора. Почему ты избегаешь говорить о том, что Ксавьер Калькасар — опасный радикал? Настолько же, насколько им стала я — только не во имя утопических идей, а во имя защиты Человечества с помощью расширенного инструментария".

Why are you avoiding talking about the fact that Xavier Calcazar is a dangerous radical? No less dangerous than I am — except I am not driven by utopian ideals, but by a desire to protect Humanity... using a broader range of tools."

"Actions are being driven by this philosophy, Interrogator van Calox. Mine. Yours. The Lord Inquisitor's. Why are you avoiding talking about the fact that Xavier Calcazar is a dangerous radical? No less dangerous than I am — except I am not driven by utopian ideals, but by a desire to protect Humanity... using a broader range of tools."

"Actions are being driven by this philosophy, Interrogator van Calox. Mine. Yours. The Lord Inquisitor's. Why are you avoiding talking about the fact that Xavier Calcazar is a dangerous radical? No less dangerous than I am — except I am not driven by utopian ideals, but by a desire to protect Humanity... using a broader range of tools."

"Actions are being driven by this philosophy, Interrogator van Calox. Mine. Yours. The Lord Inquisitor's. Why are you avoiding talking about the fact that Xavier Calcazar is a dangerous radical? No less dangerous than I am — except I am not driven by utopian ideals, but by a desire to protect Humanity... using a broader range of tools."

languages.text: “我们所有的行为，都是由这种哲学理念驱使的，冯·卡洛克斯审讯官。无论是我，是你，还是大审判官本人，都是如此。希维尔·卡尔卡扎是个危险的激进分子，你为什么对这一点避而不谈？他甚至比我还要危险。只不过，驱使我的并不是什么理想主义的哲学理念，而是保护人类的渴望……我愿意通过更加广泛的工具来实现这个目标。”
languages.original_text: "Actions are being driven by this philosophy, Interrogator van Calox. Mine. Yours. The Lord Inquisitor's. Why are you avoiding talking about the fact that Xavier Calcazar is a dangerous radical? No less dangerous than I am — except I am not driven by utopian ideals, but by a desire to protect Humanity... using a broader range of tools."

traits.locale_text: “我们所有的行为，都是由这种哲学理念驱使的，冯·卡洛克斯审讯官。无论是我，是你，还是审判长本人，都是如此。希维尔·卡尔卡扎是个危险的激进分子，你为什么对这一点避而不谈？他甚至比我还要危险。只不过，驱使我的并不是什么理想主义的哲学理念，而是保护人类的渴望……我愿意通过更加广泛的工具来实现这个目标。”

languages.text: «Esta filosofía impulsa actos, interrogador van Calox. Los míos. Los suyos. Los del Lord Inquisidor. ¿Por qué se niega a reconocer que Xavier Calcazar es un radical peligroso? Tanto como yo... solo que a mí no me motivan los ideales utópicos, sino el deseo de proteger a la Humanidad... con una mayor selección de herramientas».
languages.original_text: "Actions are being driven by this philosophy, Interrogator van Calox. Mine. Yours. The Lord Inquisitor's. Why are you avoiding talking about the fact that Xavier Calcazar is a dangerous radical? No less dangerous than I am — except I am not driven by utopian ideals, but by a desire to protect Humanity... using a broader range of tools."

traits.locale_text: «Esta filosofía impulsa actos, interrogador van Calox. Los míos. Los suyos. Los del Lord Inquisidor. ¿Por qué se niega a reconocer que Xavier Calcazar es un radical peligroso? Tanto como yo... solo que a mí no me motivan los ideales utópicos, sino el deseo de proteger a la Humanidad... con una mayor selección de herramientas».

languages.text: 「行動はこの哲学によって動かされています、インテロゲイター ヴァン・カロックス。私のものであり、あなたのものでもあり、ロード・インクィジターのものです。なぜ、あなたはザビエル・カルカサルが危険な急進派であるという事実について話すことを避けているのですか？私と同じくらい危険です…私がユートピア的な理想に動かされていないことを除いては。私は、より幅広い手段を使って人類を守りたいと思っています」
languages.original_text: "Actions are being driven by this philosophy, Interrogator van Calox. Mine. Yours. The Lord Inquisitor's. Why are you avoiding talking about the fact that Xavier Calcazar is a dangerous radical? No less dangerous than I am — except I am not driven by utopian ideals, but by a desire to protect Humanity... using a broader range of tools."

traits.locale_text: 「行動はこの哲学によって動かされています、インテロゲイター ヴァン・カロックス。私のものであり、あなたのものでもあり、ロード・インクィジターのものです。なぜ、あなたはザビエル・カルカサルが危険な急進派であるという事実について話すことを避けているのですか？私と同じくらい危険です…私がユートピア的な理想に動かされていないことを除いては。私は、より幅広い手段を使って人類を守りたいと思っています」

languages.text: « Nos actes sont motivés par cette philosophie, interrogateur van Calox. Les miennes. Les vôtres. Celles du seigneur inquisiteur. Pourquoi refusez-vous d'admettre que Xavier Calcazar est un dangereux extrémiste ? Il n'est pas moins dangereux que moi, sauf que je ne me bats pas pour des idées utopiques, mais dans le but de protéger l'humanité... en employant une palette d'outils plus variés. »
languages.original_text: "Actions are being driven by this philosophy, Interrogator van Calox. Mine. Yours. The Lord Inquisitor's. Why are you avoiding talking about the fact that Xavier Calcazar is a dangerous radical? No less dangerous than I am — except I am not driven by utopian ideals, but by a desire to protect Humanity... using a broader range of tools."

traits.locale_text: « Nos actes sont motivés par cette philosophie, interrogateur van Calox. Les miennes. Les vôtres. Celles du seigneur inquisiteur. Pourquoi refusez-vous d'admettre que Xavier Calcazar est un dangereux extrémiste ? Il n'est pas moins dangereux que moi, sauf que je ne me bats pas pour des idées utopiques, mais dans le but de protéger l'humanité... en employant une palette d'outils plus variés. »

languages.text: "Handlungen basieren auf dieser Philosophie, Interrogator van Calox. Meine. Eure. Die des Großinquisitors. Warum meidet Ihr das Gespräch über die Tatsache, dass Xavier Calcazar ein gefährlicher Radikaler ist? Nicht weniger gefährlich als ich – nur dass mich keine utopischen Ideale antreiben, sondern der Wunsch, die Menschheit zu beschützen ... mit einer größeren Vielfalt von Werkzeugen."
languages.original_text: "Actions are being driven by this philosophy, Interrogator van Calox. Mine. Yours. The Lord Inquisitor's. Why are you avoiding talking about the fact that Xavier Calcazar is a dangerous radical? No less dangerous than I am — except I am not driven by utopian ideals, but by a desire to protect Humanity... using a broader range of tools."

traits.locale_text: "Handlungen basieren auf dieser Philosophie, Interrogator van Calox. Meine. Eure. Die des Großinquisitors. Warum meidet Ihr das Gespräch über die Tatsache, dass Xavier Calcazar ein gefährlicher Radikaler ist? Nicht weniger gefährlich als ich – nur dass mich keine utopischen Ideale antreiben, sondern der Wunsch, die Menschheit zu beschützen ... mit einer größeren Vielfalt von Werkzeugen."

languages.text: "Eylemlerimizi bu felsefe yönlendirir Sorgucu van Calox. Benimkini. Seninkini. Lord Engizisyoncu'nunkini. Xavier Calcazar'ın tehlikeli bir radikal olduğu gerçeğini konuşmaktan neden kaçınıyorsun? Benden daha az tehlikeli değil. Tek fark benim ütopik idealler peşinde koşmak yerine, İnsanlığı koruma arzusuna sahip olmam. Daha geniş bir gereç seçkisini kullanarak."

Why are you avoiding talking about the fact that Xavier Calcazar is a dangerous radical? No less dangerous than I am — except I am not driven by utopian ideals, but by a desire to protect Humanity... using a broader range of tools."
